title: Tour Today! 2 Bedroom Ready Now!
posting_body: ['Welcome to Evergreen Ridge Apartments.', 'Our reasonably priced apartment homes are designed with the space and care to keep you happy for months or years to come.', "Whether you're looking for a short term solution or your forever home, Evergreen Ridge Apartments is here for you today, tomorrow and always.", 'Stop by to view our spacious two bedroom apartment home.', 'Located conveniently on the 2nd floor, above assigned parking space and in close proximity to laundry facilities.', 'Spacious walk in storage closet and linen closet, plus plenty of counter and cabinet space in the kitchen.', 'We offer:', 'Flexible Leases', 'Spacious Living rooms', 'All Electric Kitchens', 'Dishwashers', 'Garbage Disposals', 'Dedicated Dining rooms', 'Amble Closet spaces', 'Balcony, Deck, or Patio', 'Ceiling fans', 'Cable-Ready', 'On site Laundry (6 facilities)', 'One assigned parking space w/ one additional open parking spot for assigned vehicles.', 'Water, Sewage and Garbage Set Rate', 'Located in San Bruno, San Mateo County.', 'Near South San Francisco, Daly City, Pacifica.', 'Evergreen Ridge Apartments offers an enviable location with great shopping and delicious local restaurants just minutes from your doorstep.', 'If you feel like going for a bike ride or jog, wonderful trails are located nearby for your enjoyment too.', 'The surroundings at Evergreen live up to the community’s name, with idyllically kept trees and a charming courtyard.', 'Choose your new home today!', '*With 12 months lease.', 'Prices, availability, and terms are subject to change without notice and subject to approval of application and credit.', 'Pet restrictions: size and breed; additional security deposit; monthly pet rent.']
